Articles.Content:
I'm willing to join the chat! Just as soon as I get out of school...

If we agree not to kill each other you're welcome to join

I'll tune in. Can you link it?

Salute! That ship is responsible for the Drekevak...

They don't exactly compete any more though. Going from 33-160-98(ish) kinda puts them out of each others crosshairs.

EDIT:

Haz carrier now
I'm streaming when I set everything up. Zekes just jump on Skype and I'll add you.

Ok, here's the link to the stream:

http://www.twitch.tv/sbowyer28
Um, Technical Difficulties, Be live at 6:30 EST. HatBat will probably be asleep so Zekes? Up for streaming with me?
Isn't that within the hour?

Isn't that within the hour?

About 10 minutes hoping there are no more issues. Spartwo you're free to join the call too!!! I'll be testing out some new ships and stoof
I'm watching the stream, no mic for the restpart.
Sorry, Technical problems. I'll be working on that and streaming will restart at 9EST and the Fabulous Zekes will be joining me.

Sorry, Technical problems. I'll be working on that and streaming will restart at 9EST and the Fabulous Zekes will be joining me.

I'd try and join in on the stream (voice only, due to a crappy cam), but I've got IRL stuff going on that precludes me from doing that.

Also, the SX-3 has been reborn:

I'll put it up in the DL folder on my OP on page 2 of this thread, once some more testing has gone down.

I'd try and join in on the stream (voice only, due to a crappy cam), but I've got IRL stuff going on that precludes me from doing that.

Also, the SX-3 has been reborn:

http://i.imgur.com/mjhz037.png

I'll put it up in the DL folder on my OP on page 2 of this thread, once some more testing has gone down.

I want fleetmaster to try out that pak fa I released. It'll be like old times...

I want fleetmaster to try out that pak fa I released. It'll be like old times...

I was actually planning on testing my Air to Air missiles XD

I was actually planning on testing my Air to Air missiles XD

Then you can also test out the new missiles on the pak fa.

Also, could I have a stream link?
Same link HatBat posted. Starts at around 9pm EST

Aw shucks, might as well just get this done with.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

///Ship Stats:///

Mass: 99 tons

Parts: 652

Crew: 2 Kerbals, 3 internal probe cores (embedded in the ship's high-impact spine.)

//ACTION GROUPS://

1- LVNs

2- Fire 1st dual salvo of Shredders.

3- Fire 2nd Shredder salvo.

4- Fire both broadside i-beam emplacements.

5- Toggle ion-drive backup.

Brakes- Toggle Solar Arrays.

All other weapons are fired via staging.

DISCLAIMER: NO LAUNCH VEHICLE INCLUDED. YOU WILL NEED TO EITHER HYPEREDIT IT INTO ORBIT OR MAKE YOUR OWN LIFTER.

DL: https://www.dropbox.com/s/z6fkvnjaij3gt0f/MU%20SX-3%20Ingressor%20MK2.craft?dl=0
Everybody is posting updated craft and chatting on Skype and I'm just sitting her cleaning house so I can go home tomorrow.

Everybody is posting updated craft and chatting on Skype and I'm just sitting her cleaning house so I can go home tomorrow.

haha, sorry for that... i'm swamped by school a lot but i'm managing to find time to do KSP here and there... sadly when KSP gets a construction overhaul it might slow my building down that would be bad

haha, sorry for that... i'm swamped by school a lot but i'm managing to find time to do KSP here and there... sadly when KSP gets a construction overhaul it might slow my building down that would be bad

It done with most of my craft. Im just fine tuning them. After I ll post them all at one time. Right now though I just have little motivation to do so but I know I need to
Stream guys, No sound at the moment but I'm working on it. In the meantime come watch me blow some S*** up

Stream guys, No sound at the moment but I'm working on it. In the meantime come watch me blow some S*** up

Sadly, it looks like your stream's offline.
It keeps bugging out, just wait.
Hey, when you warp with the Drek, add the sound effects from the USS Vengeance... (skip to 1:15)

I was unconscious for the past few hours, but I'm guessing the stream didn't happen?

Also, while EladDv is working on the project, I've decided to explore the modernization of the destroyer.

Nevermind. It seems fleetmaster had some fun.

Edited October 16, 2014 by andrew123
So did the stream happen? And yeah, it'd be cool to use those sound effects for the Drek, Zekes. Mind finding somewhere I can get them? I can't find any clean versions of it :/

So did the stream happen? And yeah, it'd be cool to use those sound effects for the Drek, Zekes. Mind finding somewhere I can get them? I can't find any clean versions of it :/

I heard it happened, but fleetmaster refuses to let me see any screenshots, claiming that 'since you missed it, I'm not showing YOU any of my classified equipment'. (Haha.)

He's referring to a missile. (With the original technology copied from my AIM-9. That's a fact. )

Anyways, I've got AP homework to do.
